room_title: Escape room "Bank Robbery" by Conundrum Workshop in Bowling Green
review: We did the Bank Robbery room and it was awesome! Very challenging, but so much fun! We escaped with 1 minute and 17 seconds left! Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Bank Robbery" by Conundrum Workshop in Bowling Green
review: Awesome place to go! We did the Bank Robbery and it was hard, but we escaped! The owners were super nice, and very great people!

room_title: Escape room "Bank Robbery" by Conundrum Workshop in Bowling Green
review: We loved Conundrum Workshop. We did the Bank Robbery and it was quite entertaining, frustrating and exhilarating. This was just as good as our previous escape experiences. We will be back!
